param.name: help
param.label: Help
param.description: Click on the help button to get some help

param.name: alttext
param.label: Alt Text
param.description: Alternatif text which will be displayed if the user does not accept to load your images

param.name: width
param.label: Stat picture width
param.description: An image will be added in your HTML e-mails to be able to handle statistics. You can modify the width of the stat picture.

param.name: height
param.label: Stat picture height
param.description: An image will be added in your HTML e-mails to be able to handle statistics. You can modify the height of the stat picture.
